snippet: The daily fantasy sports websites DraftKings and FanDuel asked the State Supreme Court Appellate Division in Manhattan to allow them to continue operating in New York as they appeal a lower-court judge’s order to stop.
abstract: DraftKings and FanDuel ask New York State Supreme Court Appellate Division to allow them to continue doing business in state while appealing lower court's order to stop.
lead_paragraph: The daily fantasy sports websites DraftKings and FanDuel asked the State Supreme Court Appellate Division in Manhattan to allow them to continue operating in New York as they appeal a lower-court judge’s order to stop.
